/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are adorned with vibrant red and white stripes, adding a pop of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the colorful buildings. Cars and pedestrians can be seen traversing the street, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the architectural details of the buildings and the lively atmosphere of the street.
